explainsAboutApp: Senze usetyenziso olulula ukuze uthembise ngenkxaso yakho kwiinjongo zoMhla woMhlaba.
20MillionPeople: abantu abazizigidi ezingama-20 baqaphela uMhla wokuqala woMhlaba.
doYouPledge: Ngaba uyathembisa ukuxhasa iinjongo zoMhla woMhlaba?
thankYou: Enkosi ngokuthatha inxaxheba kuSuku lwethu loMhlaba olumnandi!
explainShowQRCode: Bonisa ikhowudi yakho yeQR komnye umntu ukuze afumane iithokheni ze-EARTHDAY kubo
explainScanQRCode: Skena ikhowudi ye-QR yomntu ukuze umthumele iithokheni ZE-EARTHDAY.
youHaveReceived: You will soon receive EARTHDAY tokens. Refresh in 5 minutes to view your balance.
noBalance: You don't have balance to send
chooseLanguage: Ungakhetha ulwimi lwakho apha. IsiNgesi silelona simiselweyo ukuba asinalo olunye.
title: Usuku Lomhlaba
unableToShowQR: Unable to Show the QR code
unableToReadQR: Unable to read the QR code
walletError: There is a problem communicating with your Opera wallet. Please confirm that you are using the Opera browser on an Android device, have access to the Internet, and have activated your Opera crypto wallet..
connectedWallet: Excellent! We have now connected to your Opera wallet. This is your own ixo.world address.
